description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 49467/APP/2022/2801, dated 23-02-23 (Partial demolition and extension to existing building to provide additional self-storage floorspace (Use Class B8) with associated new car and cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping and other associated works ancillary to the development) for the re-location of 2 no. parking spaces within the car park and alteration to cycle store to provide two-tier stacker.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:

Transport Statement (February 2023), Travel Plan (February 2023), Drainage Strategy (20-01-23), Technical Design Note (26 January 2023), Daylight and Sunlight Report (04-07-22), Phase I Geo-Environmental Assessment Report (August 2022), Design and Access Statement (Rev. B), Air Quality Assessment (Ref: 2203260-03), Noise Impact Assessment (Ref: 2203260-04), Planning Statement (23-08-22), Water Cycle Strategy (22-06-22), Preliminary Ecological Appraisal (July 202

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than drawing no.s 21065GA-D-005B (Refuse Strategy Plan), 21065GA-90-006C, (Cycle Parking Plan) and 21065GA-D-001E (Site Plan) associated with condition 2, which are superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission ref: 49467/APP/2022/2801 dated 22-02-23 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission and any other associated discharge of condition application which has been approved.
